name: Don Krieg
effect:
[On Play] Give up to 3 of your opponent’s rested DON!! cards to 1 of your opponent’s Characters. Then, this Character gains [Rush]

[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If this Character was played on this turn, give each of your opponent's Characters -1000 power for each DON!! card given to that character until the end of your turn.
